sentences.en: ...America's part in the postwar reconstruction of Germany.
sentences.cn: …美国在战后德国重建中扮演的角色。

sentences.en: a reconstruction of a Roman villa
Be responsible for reconstruction and develope plan of capital construction.
sentences.cn: 负责公司基建项目改造和发展规划.

sentences.en: County flood control project works two provincial reconstruction project.
sentences.cn: 县城防洪工程二期改造项目获省立项.

sentences.en: He has decided beforehand that a complete reconstruction is possible and necessary.
sentences.cn: 他事先就一口咬定彻底改造是可能的和必然的.

sentences.en: In the period of reconstruction, technique decides everything.
sentences.cn: 在重建时期, 技术决定一切.

sentences.en: No one will put a figure on the final cost of this reconstruction.
sentences.cn: 谁也不愿确切地说明这一重建最后总共的花费是多少。

sentences.en: Reconstruction of Jinlong analyzed according to development demand and practice of Jinlong.
sentences.cn: 根据金隆的发展要求,并结合金隆的生产实践,阐述了金隆闪速炉本体的改造措施.

sentences.en: Research of fast image reconstruction methods based on GPU.
sentences.cn: 基于GPU的快速重建算法研究.

sentences.en: Suggest extensive nanotech and phase one ceII reconstruction.
sentences.cn: 建议使用高级纳米技术并且使细胞的再组织同步.

sentences.en: The result was the entire reconstruction of the navies of both the antagonists.
sentences.cn: 双方的海军就从这场斗争里获得了根本的改造.

sentences.en: The secretary is expected to explore ideas for post-war reconstruction of the area.
sentences.cn: 部长预计将会探讨这个地区战后重建的意见。

sentences.en: The World Bank was created with European reconstruction in mind.
sentences.cn: 世界银行是考虑到为欧洲复兴而创建的.

sentences.en: Under these distressful circumstances it was resolved to slow down the process of reconstruction.
sentences.cn: 在这种令人痛苦的情况下,他们决定减慢重建的进程.

sentences.en: Work began on the reconstruction of the road.
sentences.cn: 道路的重建工作开始了。

trans.tran_cn: 重建，再现，重建物，复原物
trans.tran_en: the work that is done to repair the damage to a city, industry etc, especially after a war
